snippet: Scores of soldiers — and even more of their untrained volunteer supporters — were either killed or badly wounded when the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria attacked.
abstract: Iraqi forces walk into apparent trap in strategic town Tikrit, appearing on verge of victory when Islamic State in Iraq and Syria fighters launch fearsome counterattack.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and SUADAD AL-SALHY

lead_paragraph: Scores of soldiers — and even more of their untrained volunteer supporters — were either killed or badly wounded when the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria attacked.

headline.main: For Iraq, Debacle in Tikrit as Forces Walk Into Trap Set by Militants
headline.print_headline: For Iraq, Debacle in Tikrit as Forces Walk Into Trap Set by Militants

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
